description: Luigi Di Maio took the anti-establishment Five Star party into power after winning elections in 2018.
title: Luigi Di Maio: Italy populist steps down before key election
title_page: Luigi Di Maio: Italy populist steps down before key election - BBC News
maintext: He attacked the party's internal critics and insisted that after 20 months in government, it was too early to be judged. That was why it should remain in government. he said.
